    InputData

    public class MinMaxNormaliser
extends AbstractNormaliser
    Min-max normalisation, normalises the attributes between 0 and 1.
    Version:
    $Id: MinMaxNormaliser.java 3358 2010-02-11 14:35:07Z mayer $
    Author:
    Rudolf Mayer
